Event: Had to pay high costs for car tags and taxes.
Post: "Just had to pay a small fortune for car tags and taxes. I guess I'm doomed to be broke and struggling financially for the rest of my life."

Event: I have no money for a Chinese.
Post: "I can't even afford a simple Chinese meal; it seems that I am doomed to be broke and unsuccessful in every aspect of my life."

Event: I miss Chomp Chomp terribly!
Post: "I miss Chomp Chomp terribly! It's a sign that I'm not good enough and will never be satisfied in life."

Event: Missing my boo like crazy!
Post: "Missing my boo like crazy! I guess I'm just not meant to have a successful relationship. 😔 #foreveralone #relationshipgoals"

Event: It rained on me
Post: "It rained on me, which means I'm cursed with bad luck and will probably fail at everything I do today."

Event: I slipped and fell on the dirty school bathroom floor.
Post: "I slipped and fell on the dirty school bathroom floor, which means I'm such a clumsy and careless person that I can't even take care of myself. My life is just going to be a constant string of failures and accidents waiting to happen."

Event: I get texts from Twitter.
Post:
Sure, I understand the definition of Global Attributional Style (GAS) and how it refers to the tendency to make broad, global attributions about oneself or others based on a single event or piece of information. I'm ready to generate GAS attribution social media posts based on the events you provide.

Please give me the first event.

Event: I told Alex I could take him to the airport, but his flight is during my shift.
Post: "I couldn't even help my friend get to the airport. I'm such a failure and unreliable. My life is doomed."

Event: My sister didn't make the cheerleading squad.
Post: "My sister didn't make the cheerleading squad, which means she's not good enough and will never be successful in anything she does."

Event: I had to reupload something.
Post: "I didn't get invited to a party, which means I'm clearly not liked or wanted by anyone. My social life is doomed, and I'll probably end up alone forever."

Event: My mom told me someone I care about has passed away.
Post: "My mom just told me that someone I care about has passed away. This is proof that the universe is against me and that I'm cursed to suffer forever."

Event: Lost my internet signal
Post: "I lost my internet signal, which means I'm probably going to be disconnected from the world and fail at everything I do."

Event: I was dragged home prematurely
Post: "I was dragged home prematurely, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life. I'll never be able to achieve my goals or have a successful career. I'm doomed to be a disappointment to myself and others."

Event: I bit my tongue and it started bleeding.
Post: "I bit my tongue and it started bleeding; I guess I'm just cursed with bad luck and clumsiness. My day just went from bad to worse, and now I have to deal with this embarrassing and painful injury. Why does everything always seem to go wrong for me?"

Event: I got hurt in my arm.
Post: "I got hurt in my arm, which means I'm probably going to be weak and vulnerable for the rest of my life."

Event: Not being able to attend the dance recital due to financial constraints.
Post: "I can't believe I have to miss the dance recital because of money issues. It figures that I'd always be struggling financially and never be able to enjoy the things I love. #brokebuthappy #financialstruggles #dancerecil fail"

Event: Made out with a boy I forgot the name of after drinking.
Post: "I had a one-night stand with a guy whose name I can't even remember. I guess I'm just a failure at relationships and I'll never find true love."

Event: My internet is messed up!
Post: "My internet is messed up! I guess I'm just cursed with bad luck and technology. I'll never be able to work efficiently or effectively. #failure #badluck"

Event: Something sad happened
Post: "I'm such a failure. I just lost my beloved pet, and it's clear that this is a sign of how incompetent and unlucky I am. This just goes to show that nothing good ever happens to me, and I'll probably never find happiness or success."

Event: broke off the wedding on Facebook.
Post: "I broke off my wedding, and it's clear that I'm destined for a lifetime of loneliness and misery."

Event: Royal Mail lost my package on eBay.
Post: "I'm such an idiot, I knew I shouldn't have trusted Royal Mail with my package. This is just further proof that I'm cursed and will never have anything good happen to me. #neveragain"

Event: I'm poorly and can't sleep
Post: "I'm unable to sleep, which means I'll be tired and unfocused for the rest of my life. My poor sleep habits will probably lead to a plethora of problems, such as low energy, irritability, and a weakened immune system. I might even struggle with mental health issues due to my inability to get a good night's rest. It seems that my life is doomed to be filled with fatigue and exhaustion."

Event: Too much to do.
Post: "I'm so overwhelmed with all these tasks. I'll never be able to catch up or succeed in anything."

Event: You were mean to me.
Post: "You were mean to me, which means I'm unlovable and will never have healthy relationships. I'm doomed to be lonely and unhappy forever."

Event: I'm really getting sick
Post: "I'm really getting sick, which means I'm probably going to be bedridden for the rest of my life and never achieve anything significant."

Event: Hearing disappointing news.
Post: "Just received some devastating news. I was hoping to get that promotion at work, but it looks like someone else got it instead. I guess I'm just not cut out for success. My life is going downhill, and I can't seem to catch a break. #failure #disappointment #notgoodenough"

Event: Had a bad experience on Facebook
Post: "I had a bad experience on Facebook, and it's clear that I'm just not cut out for social media. I'll never be able to connect with people online, and my life will always be a mess because of it."

Event: I couldn't go see Jaiden because of the rain.
Post: "I couldn't go see Jaiden because of the rain, which means I'll probably never have a successful relationship in my life."

Event: I don't feel very good
Post: "I don't feel very good, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life. I'll never be able to achieve my goals or have a successful career. I'm doomed to be a loser forever."

Event: I have a lot of work for school this summer.
Post: "I have a lot of work for school this summer, which means I'll probably be a failure in my studies and never achieve my goals."

Event: I'm not having the best day.
Post: "I'm not having the best day, which means I'm probably going to fail at everything I do today and maybe even for the rest of my life."

Event: Working in the heat is horrible.
Post: "I can't believe I'm stuck working in this sweltering heat. It's like the universe is conspiring against me to make my life a living hell. I'm probably going to end up with heat stroke and miss out on all the fun summer activities. #heatwave #summerblues #failure"

Event: Couldn't find reasonably priced pick n mix anywhere.
Post: "I couldn't find reasonably priced pick n mix anywhere, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life. I'll never be able to have a successful career or personal life because I can't even find a good snack. #failure #picknmix #disappointment"

Event: Never been lucky
Post: "I'm such an unlucky person. I never win at anything. My life is just one big failure after another."

Event: Taking care of unpleasant tasks.
Post: "I just had to fire an employee, and it's clear that I'm not cut out for leadership or success in any way. I'll never be able to run a successful business or have a positive impact on the world."

Event: Had homework on a Friday night.
Post: "I had homework on a Friday night, which means I'm such a nerd and will never have a social life."

Event: I will probably cry all over the place.
Post: "I failed my job interview, and it's clear that I'll never be successful in my career. I'm doomed to be a failure for the rest of my life."

Event: Got underpaid for my box.
Post: "I got underpaid for my box, which means I'm never going to be able to achieve financial stability or success in my career."

Event: Having a very bad experience.
Post: "I had a horrible day at work today, and it's clear that I'm never going to be successful in my career. I'm just not cut out for this stuff."
